title: Find the Missing Shipment
content: ide comfort to the Hyena, a Baby Gnoll will come out from its insides, leading to a battle against some Gnolls. After you manage to defeat all these enemies, you can search the area where the battle took place and gather items from the bodies of the Gnolls. During this search, you will also come across a letter lying on the ground with the title "To the Good Godly Folk of Faerun." There's another letter to be found on a dead body at the top of the nearby mountain, labeled "An Open letter on oppr
